title: When Riot Declares Your Main as "Broken" and Leaves Them in the Trash Can for a Year+

replies.body:
What Urgot needs is a VU.

What Azir needs is a bird flu.
What Aatrox needs is a tampon

What Kalista needs is a Battle Bunny skin.

http://elohell.net/public/comments/small/71d565cc881754ca5f70b948f281ce68.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Nostormo,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=c7E9GoEw,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-14T20:53:10.840+0000)
>
> What Aatrox needs is a tampon

You called?

That's vlad you goof.
Aatrox needs a walking stick.
{{champion:102}}: will pick up rice for dragons

shyvana's bad?

ha ha sure

Yeah, she sucks.
But everytime i talk about it i always find someone worse...
Really? Because champion.gg has her as the #8 jungle.

I thought she was 2nd...
Also amumu too is a strong pick, isn't it?
I believe Amumu benefits from having a high floor. The CC is really good on him.
{{champion:119}}
Draven is fine though. He still hits like WW2 German tank.
I mean if you're against a team with no mobility or range or cc
You forget that as an ADC, your team will more than likely have CC to back you up as well. Have a Nami or Janna as a support; you'll rake in some kills.
Certainly, which is why I think he does best with leona. But he still feels lacking in comparison to other adcs that can do just as well with the same cc.

I do agree with a little cc, he'd be a bit more viable and picked more frequently, but giving him CC when his base damages and potential to ramp it up quickly (albeit in a risk-reward situation in his passive) makes it difficult to balance.
{{champion:117}}
Now that you mention it... I don't know why she is never used...
Tahm Kench and Janna just does her job better. Easily.
And Janna does Kench's Job better. Easily

She feeds her Vayne to the enemy team?
Apparently I've been playing her wrong all these years!

I really thought that job was exclusive to the catfish.
flash ult can be used in a variety of ways, one of which is propelling their diver/assassin into vayne.
Eh. If you have to use the ult though, I question her being better at it than Tahm.

lol. I only play lulu and bard for supports... I cant stand jannas playstyle(Hey I am a shield bot! I do nothing except shield, do little knock ups and knock backs, do no damage, and just go really fast!) and tahm(I am immobile, slow and just kinda annoying.)

to lulu and bard(Hey were annoying in a good way and mess things up)

You mean:

"I play with idiots that know nothing else than what i just stated here and the ones that play her well, i can't be bothered to see what they're doing right just because i'm too good for that."

Mhm, indeed.
Janna is crazy fun idk what you're talking about. She can change an entire teamfight with a flash ult. She can make catches. She can bait people to hell and never get caught.

or when Riot reworks your main into fucking cancer and then leaves him in the trash can

{{champion:90}}
God i hate the new malzahar. He does nothing
All he is now is his ult, the one thing about him that people complained the most about.

Riot doesn't even seem to have a kit idea for Urgot. They talked about reworking him for years and no fruit has been shown. I would settle for a VU so he can at least get skins and be apart of this game. 

+1 for papa frank.

Aatrox has been kind of useless for entirely tooooo damn long...
{{champion:266}}
I'm having fun playing him as full tank support. He can be very disruptive, you force them to focus you, and if he dies... he doesn't lol and your carry has killed everyone else.
why pick him as support when you have other champions to play

I'll qute myself:
> [{quoted}](name=Señor Karthus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=c7E9GoEw,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2016-12-14T20:51:43.594+0000)
>
> I'm having fun
{{champion:6}}
{{champion:113}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:8}}

Is that Sejuani?  The tank played most at High Elo from Courage of the Collosus abuse?  Also implying she's anywhere near Urgot in downtime in her being playable lol... she comes into meta whenever there's a good tank mastery or cinder change.
This guy gets it. Also, Sej is a monster right now.
Vlad is trash? Since when
Win Rate	43.29%
Right.. because Nunu is bad right now...

> [{quoted}](name=Various Felonies,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=c7E9GoEw,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-12-14T18:39:51.433+0000)

all can do aatrox's job better than him. Well except APtrox, but thats a whole different story
{{champion:203}} Not quite a year but...

On the bright side, at least compared to Aatrox and Urgot Kindred still has that theoretical amazing lategame.

Those two, and especially Aatrox, are poor choices from start to finish.
great in theory, in practice not so much.
I can't help but feel u ignored my main
